articles.author: MARC LEVY, JOSH BOAK
articles.title: Trump vows to block Japanese steelmaker from buying US Steel, pledges tax incentives and tariffs - The Associated Press
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump is underscoring his intention to block the purchase of U.S. Steel by Japanese steelmaker Nippon Steel Corp., and he’s pledging to use tax incentives and tariffs to strengthen the iconic American steelmaker. Trump said during the c…
articles.content: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) President-elect Donald Trump is underscoring his intention to block the purchase of U.S. Steel by Japanese steelmaker Nippon Steel Corp., and hes pledging to use tax incentives a… [+4545 chars]
